duties_responsibilities.duty: Advocate for clients and provide support and compassion to help them take back their lives.
Educate clients on the treatments offered by Serenity Healthcare.
Gather, review, and verify all pertinent information relating to the patient and their visit.
Communicate directly with participating healthcare providers regarding patient care.
Educate patients on the treatment options provided by Serenity Healthcare.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED. Previous experience in a full-time customer service role.
